item.description:
The Western MA Developers Group is an informal group of local software developers that meet every other Thursday for coffee and tech chat. People in the group come from a variety backgrounds (desktop software, web development, microcontrollers, etc) and languages (Python, Java, PHP, C++, Clojure, .NET langs, etc). Talk ranges from job war stories and programming topics to movies, gadgets, phone apps and whatever else people want to talk about.

More information here (calendar in the bottom right corner of the page):
http://wmassdevs.com/...

----

We have another meeting coming up, Thursday. We'll be meeting up at our usual haunt, Panera Bread in Hadley and we'll be gathering towards the back of the restaurant. Come join us for some coffee, a snack, and some pleasant chatting about all things development.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Western MA Developers' Group
